Title: Relates to creating a statewide registry for individuals waiving the right to purchase firearms, rifles or shotguns
Summary: Requires the division of state police to develop and maintain a statewide registry of individuals who have waived the right to purchase firearms, rifles, or shotguns; provides for the allowance of revocation of such waivers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to creating a statewide registry for individuals waiving the right to purchase firearms, rifles or shotguns
